I'm not worried about what happened the last seven years, I'm worried about this Phil JacksonADELPHIA( AP)-- Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. "That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the Robert Horrys are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."

Mr Zahi Hawass , who was appointed minister of state antiquities yesterday as part of the cabinet reshuffle, said: If the museum is safe, Egypt is safe. Looters were able to break into the museum on Friday, ripping the heads off two mummies and damaging about 75 small artefacts before soldiers caught them. Mr Zahi Hawass said the broken artefacts could be restored.
